item.title: Custom Named Entity Recognition Model with Deep Learning
item.description: Objective Build a NLP model which can extract out the important keywords (related to a particular domain) from documents. Â Description In this project i have trained a custom Named Entity Recognition Model, which takes input of strings (max size 40) and predicts the Named Entities from the text. It used ELMo (Embeddings from Language Models) , bi directional LSTM and a time distributed dense layer. Technology Stack Python, Keras, Tensorflow, LSTM
